bot.name: Yordamchi Dev Bot - AI Assistant
bot.description: AI-powered development assistant with task analysis and project management
bot.author: Golang O'rganish Guruhi

messages.welcome:
🤖 Welcome to Yordamchi Dev Bot - AI Assistant!

🎭 **Entertainment:** /hazil, /iqtibos
🔧 **Utilities:** /ping, /stats, /weather, /github
🚀 **AI Features:** /analyze, /create_project, /workload

Type /help for full command list!
messages.help:
📚 **Available Commands:**

🎭 **Fun & Quotes:**
/hazil - Random programming joke
/iqtibos - Motivational quote

🔧 **Utilities:**
/ping - Bot status
/stats - Usage statistics
/weather city - Weather info
/github user - GitHub user info
/metrics - Performance dashboard

🚀 **AI Project Management:**
/analyze requirement - Break down development tasks
/create_project name - Create new project
/add_member @user skills - Add team member
/workload - Team workload analysis
/list_projects - Show all projects
/list_team - Show team members

💡 Use /help command for detailed info!

jokes: 😄 Dasturchi nima uchun ko'zoynak kiyadi? Chunki Java ko'ra olmaydi! ☕
🤓 Nega dasturchilar qorong'udan qo'rqmaydi? Chunki ular har doim bug'larni topishadi! 🐛
😂 Dasturchi xotiniga: 'Do'konga boring, 1 ta non oling, agar tuxum bo'lsa 6 ta oling'. U 6 ta non bilan qaytdi! 🥖
😆 404: Hazil topilmadi... Shunchaki Stack Overflow'dan copy paste qiling! 📋
quotes: 💭 "Birinchi kod ishlamasa, console.log qo'sh" - Har bir dasturchi
🎯 "Mukammal kod yo'q, faqat ishlayotgan kod bor" - Pragmatik Dasturchi
🚀 "Kodingizni sodda yozing, bug'lar yashirinish uchun joy kam bo'lsin" - Linux Torvalds
⚡ "Dasturlash - bu fikrlash usuli, sintaksis emas" - Tim Peters
🧠 "Kod bir marta yoziladi, lekin ming marta o'qiladi" - Clean Code
